interpretation:
The "flag: Tonga" card represents a strong sense of national identity and pride. It symbolizes the unity of the Tongan people and their commitment to their Kingdom. This card reminds us to honor our roots and embrace our cultural heritage. It encourages us to stand up for what we believe in and to be proud of our unique identity. This card also represents the importance of community and the power of coming together for a common cause. It reminds us that we are stronger together than we are alone.

If you draw the "flag: Tonga" card, it may be a sign that you need to reconnect with your cultural or national identity. You may be feeling disconnected from your roots or struggling to find your place in the world. This card encourages you to explore your heritage and embrace the traditions that make you who you are. It may also be a reminder to stand up for your beliefs and to be proud of who you are, even if others don't understand or agree.

Overall, the "flag: Tonga" card represents a deep sense of pride and unity. It reminds us to honor our heritage and to stand up for what we believe in.
